title: Inter-Agent Communication Consolidation
question: How should fugue consolidate its multiple inter-agent communication mechanisms into a reliable, coherent system?
context: fugue has accumulated multiple overlapping mechanisms for agent-to-agent communication (send_orchestration, report_status, request_help, poll_messages, broadcast, tag routing, watchdog timer). None are end-to-end reliable - BUG-069 shows messages claiming delivery but never being received. The mental model is unclear and documentation describes patterns that don't work.
constraints: Must work reliably - no false success responses
Must be testable - integration tests proving end-to-end flow
Must be simple - clear mental model for usage
Backward compatible - existing tools work or have migration path

phase_history.notes: Opened after BUG-069 revealed message delivery claims success but receiver never gets message
